name: What is that? (Aaron Wise)
description:
You arrive home from a long day at work. Tired, hungry & wet. You go to bed to start another day, but what happens during the night you can't explain. Someone, or something is in your garden & trying to get inside. Do you investigate all the commotion & try to get answers about what is hunting you in the night? Or do you bury your head in the sand & give in to death?

CONTROLS:

WASD - Move
Shift - Sprint
Spacebar - Jump
Q/E - Lean left & Right
Left Mouse/X - Interact with objects
Right Mouse - Bring up useable objects & use/switch
